creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: date seal: ne san 子弎 (Rat 3); censor seals: Watanabe 渡邊, Mera 米良, shitauri シタ賣; publisher's seal: Shō, Ryōgoku, Hirokōji, Hayashishō han 庄、両国、廣小路林庄板
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画  {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Futatsu chōchō kuruwa nikki 双蝶々曲輪日記, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1852, 3rd month.
title: Actors Arashi Rikan III as Hanaregoma Chōkichi (R) and Ichikawa Danjūrō VIII as Nuregami Chōgorō (L)
